title: Silverchair - Live from Faraway Stables 2003
description:
On Saturday April 19, 2003 Silverchair brought the "Across The Night" tour to their hometown of Newcastle, New South Wales, Australia. 

The concert was staged in the ornate and venerable Newcastle Civic Theatre - within walking distance of the band&#039;s birthplace. Surrounded by friends and family the group finally got to perform songs from their landmark album, Diorama as well as a selection of earlier works. 

Tickets for this unusually intimate show had sold out in less than ten minutes and could not be bought at any price. 

As with all dates on this special tour, Silverchair staged the concert over two separate acts. The first set showcased mainly quieter and more experimental material while the second consisted mostly of the heavier rock songs on which the band had built their reputation as an incendiary live act. 

For over two hours that night Silverchair created a rare and memorable musical experience live onstage. The four discs (2 CDs and 2 DVDs) that are contained in this package are the next best thing to actually being there. 

This boxset was released only in Australia and New Zealand in the standard PAL format, with a limited number of NTSC sets also made available through the band&#039;s official online store. 

In 2007, Live from Faraway Stables was rereleased in separate double CD and double DVD formats. 

Released November 10, 2003 
Recorded April 19, 2003 
Genre Rock, alternative, pop 
Length 133:05 


Act I 

1. "Overture" 
2. "After All These Years" (Diorama) 
3. "World Upon Your Shoulders" (Diorama) 
4. "Tuna In The Brine" (Diorama) 
5. "Luv Your Life" (Diorama) 
6. "Paint Pastel Princess" (Neon Ballroom) 
7. "Petrol & Chlorine" (Freak Show) 
8. "Across The Night" (Diorama) 
9. "Ana&#039;s Song (Open Fire)" (Neon Ballroom) 
10. "Miss You Love" (Neon Ballroom) 
11. "Steam Will Rise" (Neon Ballroom) 

Act II 

1. "Overture" 
2. "Emotion Sickness" (Neon Ballroom) 
3. "Without You" (Diorama) 
4. "Israel&#039;s Son" (Frogstomp) 
5. "Black Tangled Heart" (Neon Ballroom) 
6. "Do You Feel The Same?" (Neon Ballroom) 
7. "The Greatest View" (Diorama) 
8. "The Door" (Freak Show) 
9. "Freak" (Freak Show) 
10. "Anthem for the Year 2000" (Neon Ballroom) 
11. "One Way Mule" (Diorama) 
12. "Asylum" 
13. "The Lever" (Diorama)
